Html: I put GMap in a UserControl and want to render this UserControl which constains the Gmap  by using class RenderTargetBitmap.  The Gmap does not show out unless I show a window and set the userControl that contains Gmap to the content of this window. If anyone knows the problem? I just want to render UserControl that contains a Gmap without puting the UserControl in a window to show window and render the the UserControl?
Simply, the GMapControl is not loaded until a window that contains the GMapControl shows. My point is if I can make GMapControl loaded without puting it in a window?
I want to use GMapControl without using window, it may sound silly...
but how do you show it then?
.........I don't want to show it... I just want to render it without showing it on screen....
you can hide the window or construct static image generator like in BigMapMaker demo
